titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the reduction in the deductible portion of expenses for business meals and entertainment.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S76)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
1/4/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the income tax deduction for business meals and entertainment expenses from 50 to 75% of such expenses in calendar year 2007, and 80% in 2008 and thereafter.
